body_html:
For my particular purpose since the outer dimensions are so small (the inner dimension might be big), it will likely be fast enough to just do an expand, cmul, and sum.

Hopefully nobody else needs to do batched small MMs on Maxwell.

body:
For my particular purpose since the outer dimensions are so small (the inner dimension might be big), it will likely be fast enough to just do an expand, cmul, and sum.

Hopefully nobody else needs to do batched small MMs on Maxwell.
